{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = DSL-G31 1.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 802.11g Wireless ADSL Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.asus.com/Networks/ADSL_Modem_Routers/DSLG31/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = ASUS_DSL-G31 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ASUS |model = DSL-G31 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, dsl modem |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQDSL-G31,QMPM505 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM6348S;BCM6348SKFBG; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = BMIPS3300 |cpu1spd = 256 <!-- 240 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;KH29LV320DBTC-70G; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = ESMT;M12L64164A-7T; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM5325E;BCM5325EKQMG; |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = none
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pad header,, |jtag = yes,, 12-pad header,,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = ADSL2+, schematics |addchip = ADSL Line Driver;Broadcom;BCM6301;BCM6301KSGT;1; ,,, 2.4GHz Front End Module;SiGe;SE2521A;SiGe, 2521A60, 8211J;1;<!--;24-pin, LGA;--> |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SGE |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/27/2009 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4318E;BCM4318EKFBG; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "[https://fccid.io/document.php?id=767656 GAW5.3Z33-5]", "REV: 0.2 10/30/06" would appear to :be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. See also [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=767666 FCC Schematics] and [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=767662 Parts List] ([[T&W]]/[[SGE]]).. :MX29 - Macronix, KH29 - [http://www.kynix.com/Detail/982501/KH29LV320DBTC-70G.html Kynix] (MXIC), EN29 - Eon
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/asus-dsl-g31-80211g-wireless-adsl-router-695 ''Asus DSL-G31'' on SpeedGuide.net] :Per [http://www.modem-help.co.uk/ASUSTeK/DSL-G31-Wireless-G-ADSL-Gateway.html?info=1 modem-help], this device uses BCM6348. *[https://www.asus.com/event/network/EOL-product/ ''End-of-Life Product List'' on '''ASUS''']
==Pictures== <center><gallery caption="from ASUS"> File:DSL-G31 1.jpg|angled File:DSL-G31 2.jpg|front File:DSL-G31 3.jpg|back File:DSL-G31 4.jpg|angled2 </gallery></center>[[Has images::external| ]]
